recipesJson.name: Cookie Chow
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
This is an all day vape of mine for a few months.  Thought I would share on ATF. 
A chewy crispy cookie with a hint of caramel and honeycomb  This is using a few of my favorite concentrates. It is Addicting!!!

Calipitter Chow concentrate can be purchased at Chefs Flavours. 
https://www.chefsflavours.co.uk/mom-pop-concentrates/1736-calipitter-chow.html?search_query=Calipitter&results=1
Translate

reviews.text: I have a mixed review because this is spot on what it should taste like.  However it turns out that I am not really into vaping toasted juices lol.  I did have to use a different rice crispy treat and add some caramel though so that could be the issue.  I am still giving this a great review because it was very accurate and she did a great job on this recipe.  It tastes like honey nut cheerios covered in sweet sticky goo with hints of cream in the mix.

Heaven!!! Awesome!!! P E R F E C T ! ! !
Calipitter Chow single @ 5% is Very good as well!
